amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that section 203, relating to oil and gas lease sales in the Southern California planning area, and Title III, relating to OCS revenue sharing with coastal states, have no force or effect.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 113-131 to ensure Section 203, relating to oil and gas lease sales in the Southern California planning area, and Title III, relating to OCS revenue sharing with coastal states, have no force or effect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 241 (Roll no. 302).
